steps.query:
SELECT sum(volume), timestamp from (SELECT volume, strptime(substr(timestamp, 0, 11), '%Y-%m-%d') from demofile_csv where station = 843) _a
GROUP BY timestamp
ORDER BY timestamp
steps.title: Cell 1

steps.query:
SELECT sum(volume), timestamp, station from (SELECT volume, strptime(substr(timestamp, 0, 11), '%Y-%m-%d'), station from demofile_csv) _a
where station < 10
GROUP BY timestamp, station
ORDER BY timestamp
steps.title: Cell 2
